title: WTB:  Final 8 SL'ers for the Monster
author: ZiggerZagger

posts.post_title: WTB:  Final 8 SL'ers for the Monster
posts.post_content:
Hi all.  Have made some great progress on the Monster this past year with some help from board members.
Currently at 496/520 in graded 4.0 - 5.0 in PSA/SGC holders, with an emphasis on centering.

Looking for the last [STRIKE]11[/STRIKE] 8 SL'ers to close it out.  PayPal Gift at the ready, or whatever you prefer.

[STRIKE]1)  Fritz, Charlie[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]2)  Greminger, Ed[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]3)  Helm, J. Ross[/STRIKE]
4)  Kiernan, J.F.
5)  McCauley, Pat
6)  Mullaney, Dom
7)  Otey, William
8)  Perdue, Hub
9)  Ryan, Ray
10) Smith, Sid
11) Thebo, Tony

Thanks in advance!
.

I have an SGC 4.0 Tony Thebo Old mill
If interested, shoot me a text 810-280-0059

Picked up 3 beauties last night -- down to 8 SL'ers needed.

Thanks!
